description:
The big showdown between Taiki and Yuu has begun in Hell`s Field. Yuu attacks with a sword, overwhelming Taiki with his surprising strength. As they battle, Yuu confesses his reason for hiding his true strength all along, and reveals the words of DarkKnightmon that freed him when he came to the Digital World. Finally Taiki sees Yuu`s true nature and vows to fight him in earnest. Can Taiki defeat Yuu and make him see the truth?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taiki VS Yuu, Shounen General Taiketsu!!
Taiki VS Yuu, the Battle of the Boy Generals!!
タイキVSユウ, 少年ジェネラル対決!!
